text:
[Verse]
Look at the night shine bright
Stars all around in the sky
Dreams take flight with no sound
I feel alive tonight

[Verse 2]
Wishing upon a bright star
Close my eyes take me far
Endless dreams in the air
Nothing else can compare

[Chorus]
Stars in my eyes tonight
Make me feel so alive
Under the light they shine
Stars in my eyes tonight

[Verse 3]
Dance in the glow of the night
Twinkling all in my sight
Magic beyond the skies
Lost in the stars so high

[Bridge]
Hearts beat with every light
Silent whispers that fly
Hope in each glowing spark
Guiding me through the dark

[Chorus]
Stars in my eyes tonight
Make me feel so alive
Under the light they shine
Stars in my eyes tonight
title: Stars in My Eyes
